testcase.name: user Login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user add login_id "test" and password "test1234".......................passed And click on login button...................................................passed Then user successfully logged in and navigate to task screen................passed

testcase.name: user Login failed with invalid loginId
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user add login_id "xyz" and password "test@1234".......................passed And click on login button...................................................passed Then user get an error message failed to login..............................passed

testcase.name: user Login failed with invalid password
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user add login_id "test" and password "Pass@12345".....................passed And click on login button...................................................passed Then user get an error message failed to login..............................passed

testcase.name: user Login failed with invalid loginId and invalid password
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user add login_id "test" and password "test12345"......................passed And click on login button...................................................passed Then user get an error message failed to login..............................passed
